system.description: Effect: The user changes its Type to that of an attack on its Active List for 5 activations or until switched out. If the user is Multi-Typed, it changes a Type of its choice.

actions.name: Conversion
actions.description: Effect: The user changes its Type to that of an attack on its Active List for 5 activations or until switched out. If the user is Multi-Typed, it changes a Type of its choice.
